description: Pursuing a Master of Business Administration with a focus on management and leadership in business environments.

Developed a custom healthcare staffing platform for a $700 million client. Engineered a centralized AI-driven job listing application. Designed and implemented a $5 million loyalty rewards program to enhance customer engagement.

Scaled three successful, award-winning small ventures. Grew business through innovative marketing strategies, achieving a three-month reservation waitlist. Fostered community impact by mentoring employees, hiring individuals with employment barriers, sourcing goods globally from small businesses.
